description.narrative: Output 3.1: By the end of 2021, national and subnational capacities for data collection and analysis of the situation of child poverty, as well as evaluation of social programmes and policies are strengthened.

sector.narrative: Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty

Support to other social protection programs: Child care and early childhood development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Existence of a monitoring system for children living with vulnerabilities

Shock-responsive SP: Operational mechanisms are strengthened to adapt and/or expand in a timely manner during crisis (targeting and registration, MIS, coordination, monitoring, cash delivery system, complaints, communication, linking with complementary services, HR capacity)

actual.value: 2020:Assessment completed and activities planned for way forward in 2019-20 WP with MCLSW
